programme.title: Beasts Clawing at Straws
programme.desc: The destinies of hard-luck lowlifes slowly converge and come crashing down: Jung-man barely gets by working at a sauna and taking care of his sick mother until he finds a bag full of cash in the locker room; Tae-young is in trouble after his girlfriend runs away with the money he borrowed from a loan shark. Soon, a dead body mysteriously turns up; Mi-ran, caught between her husband’s violence and a dead-end job as a bar hostess, she finds a young lover Jin-tae, who offers to kill her husband… And now their dog-eat-dog game starts.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr. Lee
programme.desc: Cheol-Soo, an attractive and well-built man with intellectual disabilities, sets out on a trip with the daughter he never knew he had.

programme.title: Stalker
programme.desc: A woman suffers from a bizarre experience in a low-rent house and learns the terrible things about the house.

programme.title: On Your Wedding Day
programme.desc: Woo-Yeon and Seung-Hee pretend to date to avoid troubles from others. Will the relationship develop?

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: A mission begins to stop a super volcanic eruption threatening to engulf both North and South Korea.

programme.title: The King of Prison
programme.desc: In prison, new inmate Man-hee caught in rising tensions between Beom-teol and Tae-soo as violence escalates.

programme.title: My Wife is a Gangster 3 : HK Edition
programme.desc: A Mafia boss's daughter is wrongly accused of murder and sent to Korea, where an assassin is sent to kill her.

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: Suk-jung’s devotion to Eun-ha leads him to search for her after her past and HIV force her to leave him.

programme.title: Part-time Spy
programme.desc: Government official goes undercover to a phishing group to retrieve budget, where she meets an undercover cop.

programme.title: SAMJIN COMPANY ENGLISH CLASS
programme.desc: Three female office workers take English classes for promotions and team up to expose company corruption.

programme.title: Secret Confession
programme.desc: In-man is a timid but caring man who creates a suicide group for his first night and suggests a 'bucket list'.

programme.title: The Intimate
programme.desc: A bride-to-be accepts an invitation from a stranger to be his woman for a day, thinking it is her last fling.
